MainHero.title: Agrico Group – TOGETHER TO SUCCESS
MainHero.doverie: Quality, trust and innovation for your success

AboutUs.title: Agrico Group
AboutUs.discription: Leading company in Kyrgyzstan, specializing in the export and import of goods, investment opportunities and the textile industry. We strive to be a bridge between Kyrgyzstan and the world market, providing high quality services to our clients and partners

WhyUs.description: Many years of experience in international markets

Statics.experience: Years of Experience in International Markets

HowWeWork.title: How We Work
HowWeWork.description: Agreco Group supplies goods from Kyrgyzstan to more than 30 countries worldwide. We actively collaborate with partners in Europe, Asia, America, and other regions, expanding the geography of our business and strengthening international connections.

TrustedPartner.title: Trusted Partner in International Trade
TrustedPartner.yearsExperience: Years of Experience in International Markets

agriculturalProducts.title: Agricultural Products
agriculturalProducts.desc: Export of fruits, vegetables, grains, and nuts from the environmentally clean regions of Kyrgyzstan.

textileProducts.title: Textile Products
textileProducts.desc: We supply textile products, including fabrics, clothing, and accessories, custom-made to high-quality standards.

mineralResources.title: Mineral Resources
mineralResources.desc: Export of minerals and other natural resources extracted from the territory of Kyrgyzstan.

souvenirProducts.title: Souvenir Products
souvenirProducts.desc: Creative items and souvenirs reflecting the unique culture of Kyrgyzstan.

InvestHero.title: Investments in Kyrgyzstan
InvestHero.description: Invest in the future of Kyrgyzstan with Agrico Group. Opportunities in construction, agriculture, and light industry.
InvestHero.text2: Annual growth in the construction sector

Agriculture.title: Agriculture
Agriculture.dis1: Agriculture is one of the key sectors of Kyrgyzstan's economy, offering unique opportunities for investors.
Agriculture.dis2: Agreco Group will help you explore new opportunities in this sector by providing access to eco-friendly products that are in demand in international markets.

ConstructionDevelopment.title: Development of Construction
ConstructionDevelopment.dis: The demand for modern housing, commercial properties, and infrastructure projects is constantly growing.

InvestExport.title: Innovation and Export
InvestExport.dis: The light industry of Kyrgyzstan is actively developing, offering attractive conditions for investors.
InvestExport.texttwo: Annual Growth in the Construction Sector

ProductionHero.title: Sewing Production
ProductionHero.text2: Years of experience in the sewing industry

Guarantee.title: Order tailoring with Agrico Group
Guarantee.dis: We guarantee quality, speed, and an individual approach to each order!

offers.title1: Tailoring of products of any complexity
offers.desc1: We specialize in tailoring products of all types and complexities, from simple clothing to complex design solutions.
offers.desc2: We offer an individual approach to each client, ensuring precise compliance with your requirements and wishes.
offers.desc3: Our production capacities allow us to complete orders in a short time without compromising quality, ensuring stable deliveries.
offers.desc4: At every stage, we implement strict quality control to ensure that each unit of product meets expectations.

TourismHero.title: Tourism in Kyrgyzstan
TourismHero.dis: Kyrgyzstan is a country of majestic mountains, ancient cultures, and hospitable people. It offers travelers unique experiences and an introduction to nomadic culture.
TourismHero.title1: Here, nature remains in its pristine form

programIncludes.accommodation: Accommodation in hotels and cottages, breakfast
programIncludes.roadTax: Payment of road taxes and entry tickets

ActiveRest.title: Active Recreation and Adventures
ActiveRest.dis: For lovers of active recreation, Kyrgyzstan is a true paradise. We offer a variety of adventure tours.

NatureSlide.title: What to See
NatureSlide.desc1: Travel along the ancient trade routes of the Silk Road, visiting historical cities and archaeological monuments
NatureSlide.desc2: Dive into the clear waters of the 'pearl of Kyrgyzstan' – a high-altitude lake
NatureSlide.desc3: Discover the diversity of flora and fauna while enjoying the natural beauty of protected areas

FooterClientComp.title2: and we will contact you shortly

ImportProducts.name: Imported Goods
ImportProducts.desc1: Import of modern machinery and equipment for various industries and agriculture.
ImportProducts.desc2: Import of food, beverages, and other goods to meet the needs of the population of Kyrgyzstan.
ImportProducts.desc3: Supply of modern electronic devices and home appliances for the domestic market.
ImportProducts.desc4: Ensuring the domestic market is supplied with high-quality building materials and tools.

About.name: Why Choose Us
About.desc1: Our production is equipped with advanced technology, allowing us to fulfill orders of any complexity.
About.desc2: Our employees are highly qualified specialists with many years of experience in the sewing industry.
About.desc3: We are ready to adapt to your needs and offer both large-scale and small-scale production.
